name: ALIVE (itch) (Antrax-TM)
description:
ALIVE is an OFF fangame where you, the Puppeteer and your old puppet, the Batter, are sent back once again to the old world that apparently didn’t completely die after the Batter’s ending. It is still Alive. When you two are sent off to what used to be Zone 0, you notice that strange things are happening within the zone, and maybe these things are also happening to the others. What will you and the Batter do with this “new” world? Will he eradicate it again or not? Discover this in this new adventure in this bizarre world.

This demo is until the start of Zone 2 (+ a small extra room)

(If you have any question or something, don’t be afraid to do it! And if you find any error or something, please advice me.)

ALIVE is an OFF Fangame being developed by TheFollowerDemon.

Check out the Developer's page: https://twitter.com/Fxll9wD3m0n
